title: National Treasure II square font w/ small slab serifs
content:
OK, so who can identify the font used in the National Treasure II trailer? ;-)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130823033517im_/http:/typophile.com/files/nt_billing_5070.jpg)

Whatthefont.com, failed miserably when using this derived jpeg:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130823033517im_/http:/typophile.com/files/nt_font_3734.jpg)

For further use of the font, check out the full trailers:

[http://www.apple.com/trailers/disney/nationaltreasurebookofsecrets/](http://web.archive.org/web/20130823033517/http:/www.apple.com/trailers/disney/nationaltreasurebookofsecrets/ "http://www.apple.com/trailers/disney/nationaltreasurebookofsecrets/")
author: kellerman

comments.content:
Looks custom to me. Someone had a little fun with Bank Gothic or something similar.

Ralf
That is most definitely Bank Gothic with thin, slab-like serifs. I have no idea who did it.
Looks very much like it indeed, but I'm not convinced.
I've drawn a Bank Gothic; I know those letters ;-)
